[[file:Recall_icon.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
[[Recall]] is a spell that allows the caster to teleport to a location by targeting a [[Mark]]ed [[Rune]].

Casting [[Recall]] requires Black Pearl, Blood Moss and Mandrake Root and costs 11 [[Mana]].

The words spoken when casting [[Recall]] are Kal Ort Por and it's a Fourth circle spell.

==Usage==
To travel with [[Recall]], you will need a [[Mark]]ed [[Rune]]. [[Rune]]s can be purchased from the mage shop and locations can be marked with the [[Mark]] spell while standing in the desired location.

Cast the [[Recall]] spell from your spell book or use a [[Recall]] scroll, then target the marked [[Rune]]. You will be teleported to that location. You can also open a [[Runebook]] and simply click on the spell icons shown at each location. (Note: You may also cast recall on [[Ship Rune]]s in the same fashion) [[file:Open_Runebook.png|thumb]]
